snippet: Although economic growth has been subpar this year, stock returns have been healthy. It’s another sign of how the economy can have nothing to do with market performance.
abstract: Paul J Lim Fundamentally column observes that stock returns have been healthy in 2012 despite subpar economic growth, another sign of disconnect between basic economic variables and market performance.
lead_paragraph: Although economic growth has been subpar this year, stock returns have been healthy. It’s another sign of how the economy can have nothing to do with market performance.

headline.seo: The Economy and the Stock Market: A Big Disconnect
headline.main: The Economy and Stocks: A Big Disconnect
headline.print_headline: For Stock Investors, A Big Disconnect
